message:
Dear Bob,
I am excited to present an extraordinary opportunity for you to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just any commodity; it represents a significant investment and a milestone achievement for me personally. I understand that its true worth may be subjective, but I believe it could potentially hold great significance and utility for you.

I am offering this product to you for a special price of $2000000. This generous offer reflects my desire to find the right person who appreciates and values this item as much as I do. I trust that you will consider the unique qualities and potential of this product, which I am confident will exceed your expectations.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to provide you with all the information you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice
